pr_title: KAFKA-10767: Adding test cases for all, reverseAll and reverseRange for ThreadCache

timeline.bodyText: nit: Could you please use assertThat(iterator.peekNextKey(), is(the Byte)) here?

timeline.bodyText: nit: see my comment about assertThat() above.
timeline.author: cadonna
cadonna

replies.bodyText: Done. This made sense. I have also added the logic to generate the ThreadCache in a separate method(setupThreadCache) . That reduced lot of duplicate code from a lot of methods
replies.author: vamossagar12
